Name: cathode production, LiMn2O4, for Li-ion battery | cathode, LiMn2O4, for Li-ion battery | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/272:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators/2720:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators
Description: This dataset includes a method of producing a cathode for a lithium ion battery. Spinell type lithium manganese oxide acts as a Li+-ion accumulator. Free Li+-ions move out of the spinell type LiMn2O4 (charge) to the electrolyte or from the electrolyte back to the LiMn2O4 spinell (discharge).
